channel.title: Suggestion forum on rs
channel.description:
idk if this has already been posted about. but i thought player suggestions from the runescape forum could be implemented into ps's. so if you are looking for ideas for your server there are some decent suggestions on their forums. when i start making either a ps or just a game i design. hope this is in the right section sorry if it isn't.
thought this might be useful to someone is why i posted.

item.title: Suggestion forum on rs
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:

true but the rs forums are tainted with trolls D:

item.title: Suggestion forum on rs
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:3, topic:375239”]true. but if you were dedicated to making a unique and nice server its just a place to look for ideas. you wouldn’t have to implement that exact idea. you could give it your own twist and also if you have a community for your server have a poll to see what you community thought b4 you actual started coding it.[/quote]mm yes there is something in that.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion forum on rs
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

true. but if you were dedicated to making a unique and nice server its just a place to look for ideas. you wouldn’t have to implement that exact idea. you could give it your own twist and also if you have a community for your server have a poll to see what you community thought b4 you actual started coding it.

Read full topic
